title: Thai-Inspired Turkey Burgers
ingredients: ['225g (8 oz) mayonnaise', '4 tablespoons desiccated coconut, finely chopped', 'small handful chopped fresh mint', '1kg (2 1/4 lb) minced turkey', '250g (9 oz) breadcrumbs', '100ml (4 fl oz) Thai peanut sauce', '2 tablespoons red curry paste', '2 spring onions, minced', '2 tablespoons minced fresh parsley', '1 dessertspoon soy sauce', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 dessertspoon lemon juice', '1 dessertspoon lime juice', '1 tablespoon hot sauce, such as Tabasco', '8 baps, split and toasted']
